meanings.definition: The act of placing or positioning something in a specific location.
meanings.sent1: The emplacement of the vase on the table was done carefully.
meanings.sent2: The emplacement of the books on the shelf made the room look tidy.
meanings.sent3: The emplacement of the toy car in the middle of the cake surprised everyone at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her emplacement of trust in him was like building a bridge to a new friendship.
meanings.sent5: The emplacement of the key in the lock was the final step before opening the door.

meanings.definition: A specific location or position where something is placed or positioned.
meanings.sent1: The treasure map led them to the emplacement of the buried chest.
meanings.sent2: The emplacement of the statue in the park attracted many visitors.
meanings.sent3: The emplacement of the cat in the dog's bed caused a playful commotion.
meanings.sent4: His emplacement in the company as a leader was well-deserved.
meanings.sent5: The emplacement of the lighthouse on the cliff guided ships safely through the night.
